Source.Name: kgeography
Source.Summary: KGeography is a geography learning tool
Source.Description: KGeography is a geography learning tool, which allows you to learn about the political divisions of some countries (divisions, capitals of those divisions and their associated flags if there are some).
KGeography, ülkeler hakkında çeşitli bilgiler sunan bir coğrafya uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: konversation
Source.Summary: A user friendly IRC client for KDE
Source.Description: Konversation is a user-friendly Internet Relay Chat (IRC) client built on the KDE Platform.

Source.Name: libkgapi
Source.Description: A KDE-based library for accessing various Google services via their public API

Source.Name: kmix
Source.Description: KMix: KDE Digital Mixer
KMix: KDE için Dijital Mixer.

Source.Name: kidentitymanagement
Source.Description: Library for the KDE-PIM(Personal-Infomation-Management

Source.Name: ark
Source.Description: Ark is a program for managing various archive formats within the KDE environment.

Source.Name: kholidays
Source.Summary: KDE library for regional holiday information
Source.Description: KDE library for regional holiday information

Source.Name: cantor
Source.Summary: A KDE frontend to mathematical softwares
Matematiksel uygulamalar için bir KDE önyüzü
Source.Description: Cantor is an application that lets you use your favorite mathematical applications from within a nice KDE-integrated Worksheet Interface. It offers assistant dialogs for common tasks and allows you to share your worksheets with others.

Cantor; Sage, Maxima, R and KAlgebra gibi uygulamalara arayüz sağlayarak kullanımı kolaylaştırmayı amaçlar. Çok kullanılan işler için dialoglar sağlar ve çalışmalarınızı başkalarıyla paylaşabilmenize olanak tanır.

Source.Name: gpgmepp
Source.Description: C++ bindings/wrapper for gpgme
gpgme için C++ bağlayıcısı

Source.Name: libkipi
Source.Summary: Common plugin infrastructure for KDE image applications
KDE resim uygulamaları için ortak eklenti yapısı
Source.Description: Kipi (KDE Image Plugin Interface) is an effort to develop a common plugin structure (for Digikam, Gwenview, etc.). Its aim is to share image plugins among graphic applications.
Kipi, ortak bir eklenti yapısı ortaya koymak için gerekli bir kitaplıktır.

Source.Name: kdepim-runtime
Source.Summary: KDE5 PIM (Kişisel Bilgi Yönetimi) çalışma zamanı ortamı
Source.Description: kdepim-runtime contains KDE5 PIM (Personal Information Management) runtime environment like akonadi agents.
kdepim-runtime, kdelibs kullanarak yazılmış olan Akonadi ajanları da dahil olmak üzere KDE5 PIM (Personal Information Management - Kişisel Bilgi Yönetimi) çalışma zamanı ortamını içerir.

Source.Name: gwenview
Source.Description: Gwenview is an easy to use image viewer.
Gwenview, kullanımı kolay bir resim görüntüleyicisidir.

Source.Name: akonadi-search
Source.Summary: Libraries and daemons to implement searching in Akonadi
Source.Description: Libraries and daemons to implement searching in Akonadi

Source.Name: baloo-widgets
Source.Summary: Framework for searching and managing metadata
Source.Description: Baloo is a framework for searching and managing metada

Source.Name: partitionmanager
Source.Summary: KDE Partition Manager is a utility program to help you manage the disk devices, partitions and file systems on your computer
Source.Description: It allows you to easily create, copy, move, delete, resize without losing data, backup and restore partitions..

KDE Disk Bölümü Yöneticisi, disklerinizi, bölümlerinizi ve dosya sistemlerinizi yönetmenize izin verir. Birçok dosya sistemini (ext2/3/4, reiserfs, NTFS, FAT32 ve daha fazlası) desteklemenin yanı sıra, yeni bölüm oluşturabilir ya da var olan bir bölüm üzerinde boyutlandırma, kopyalama, taşıma, yedekleme ve geri yükleme işlemlerini yapabilir.

Source.Name: kate
Source.Description: Plasma library and runtime components based upon KF5 and Qt5

Source.Name: dolphin-plugins
Source.Description: This package contains plugins that offer integration in Dolphin with the following version control systems:
Dolphin için VCS (Version Control System) eklentileri.

Source.Name: kdeedu-data
Source.Summary: Common data for KDE Edu applications
Source.Description: Common data for KDE Edu applications.

Source.Name: konsole
Source.Description: Konsole for KDE5

Source.Name: okular
Source.Description: Okular is a document viewer.
Okular bir belge göstericidir.

Source.Name: kdepim
Source.Summary: KDE Pim different packages with akonadi-console, kadressbook blogilo etc
Source.Description: Provides different Packages for KDE5

Source.Name: step
Source.Description: Step is an interactive physical simulator. It allows you to explore the physical world through simulations.

Source.Name: kcontacts
Source.Description: Address book for KDE for Contacts.

Source.Name: kontactinterface
Source.Description: This library provides the glue necessary for application "Parts" to be embedded as a Kontact component (or plugin).

Source.Name: kimap
Source.Summary: Job-based API for interacting with IMAP servers
Source.Description: API for interacting with IMAP servers

Source.Name: rocs
Source.Description: Rocs aims to be a Graph Theory IDE for helping professors to show the results of a graph algorithm and also helping students to do the algorithms. Rocs has a scripting module, done in Qt Script, that interacts with the drawn graph and every change in the graph with the script is reflected on the drawn one..

Source.Name: ktnef
Source.Description: The API permits access to the actual attachments, the message properties (TNEF/MAPI), and allows one to view/extract message formatted text in Rich Text Format format.

Source.Name: kpimtextedit
Source.Description: Text Edit with KDE-PIM specific features.

Source.Name: libkdcraw
Source.Summary: A C++ interface around LibRaw library
Source.Description: libkdcraw is a C++ interface around LibRaw library used to decode RAW picture files.
libkdcraw, RAW resim dosyalarını çözmek için kullanılan LibRaW kitaplığının C++ arayüzüdür.

Source.Name: kanagram
Source.Description: Kanagram is a game based on anagrams of words: the puzzle is solved when the letters of the scrambled word are put back in the correct order. There is no limit on either time taken, or the amount of attempts to solve the word.
Kanagram, anagramlar üzerine bir oyundur. Dağınık yerleştirilmiş harfleri birleştirerek kelimeyi bulun. Zaman veya deneme sınırı yoktur.

Source.Name: ksnapshot
Source.Description: ksnapshot is a screen capture utility.
ksnapshot bir ekran görüntüsü yakalama aracıdır.

Source.Name: kdebaseapps
Source.Summary: KDE-Baseapps: base applications from the official KDE release
Source.Description: Base application for KDE5 such as Dolphin, kfind, plasma-widget-folderview, konqueror etc.

Source.Name: yakuake
Source.Summary: Very powerful Quake style Konsole for KDE4
KDE5 için Quake tarzı oldukça güçlü bir Konsole
Source.Description: The name comes from Yet Another Kuake (thus YaKuake). Its behaviour is similar to the console of the Quake game.
İsmi Bir Başka Kuake (Yet Another Kuake - YaKuake) sözcüklerinden gelmektedir. Quake oyunundaki konsola benzer.

Source.Name: kio-extras
Source.Description: Additional KIO-slaves for KDE5 applications

Source.Name: kldap
Source.Description: Allows LDAP accessing with a convenient Qt style C++ API.

Source.Name: kblog
Source.Description: KBlog is a library for calling functions on Blogger 1.0, MetaWeblog, MovableType and GData compatible blogs. It calls the APIs using KXmlRpcClient and Syndication.

Source.Name: libkeduvocdocument
Source.Summary: Common libraries for KDE Edu applications
Source.Description: Libraries for KDE EDU applications.

Source.Name: kmbox
Source.Description: MBox library support.

Source.Name: kross-interpreters
Source.Summary: Kross interpreter plugins for programming languages
Source.Description: Language interpreters to enable in-process scripting with Kross.

Source.Name: analitza
Source.Summary: A KDE library for mathematical features
Matematiksel özellikler için bir KDE kitaplığı
Source.Description: analitza is a library to add mathematical features to programs.
analitza, programlara matematiksel özellikler eklemek için bir kitaplıktır.

Source.Name: akonadi
Source.Description: akonadi is an extensible cross-desktop storage service for PIM data and meta data providing concurrent read, write, and query access.
Akonadi, PIM verisi ve meta veriler için eşzamanlı okuma, yazma ve sorgulama yapma imkanı sağlayan, masaüstü ortamından bağımsız, genişletilebilir bir depolama servisidir.

Update.Comment: Version bump. Fix crash when there are no flags to update during flags change Fix crash on Akonadi shutdown when using PostgreSQL Fix notification to clients about database upgrade Send dummy requests to MySQL from time to time to keep the connection alive Bug #277839 – Fix problem with too long socket paths Bug #323977 – Check minimum MySQL version at runtime Bug #252120, Bug #322931 – Use text instead of bytea column type for QString in PostgreSQL
Update.Name: Yusuf Aydemir

Source.Name: kde-servicemenu-rootactions
Source.Summary: Dolphin için yetkili kullanıcı eylemleri menüsü
Source.Description: kde-servicemenu-rootactions is an addon for KDE4 that provides a convenient way to perform several actions as root from the right-click context menu in Dolphin file manager.
kde-servicemenu-rootactions, Dolphin dosya yöneticisinin içerik menüsü üzerinden yetkili kullanıcı işlemlerinin gerçekleştirilebilmesini sağlayan bir eklentidir.

Source.Name: ksyndication
Source.Description: syndication is a parser library for RSS and Atom feeds.

Source.Name: kcalutils
Source.Description: Calendar utility library for KDE

Source.Name: kmime
Source.Summary: KDE library for handling mail messages and newsgroup articles.
Source.Description: Kmime library for handling mail messages and newsgroup articles.

Source.Name: khangman
Source.Summary: KHangMan is a game for kids based on the well-known hangman game
Adam asmaca oyununun çocuklar için uyarlanmış, öğretici versiyonu
Source.Description: KHangMan is a game based on the well-known hangman game. It is aimed at children aged six and over. The game has several categories of words to play with, for example: Animals (animals words) and three difficulty categories: Easy, Medium and Hard.
KHangman, adam asmaca olarak bilinen oyunun 6 yaş ve üzeri için uyarlanmış bir uygulamasıdır. Oynamak için seçilebilecek değişik kategoriler ve 3 farklı zorluk seviyesi bulunuyor.

Source.Name: dragonplayer
Source.Description: a multimedia player where the focus is on simplicity, instead of features.

Source.Name: bovo
Source.Summary: A Gomoku like game for two players.
Source.Description: Bovo is a Gomoku like game for two players, where the opponents alternate in placing their respective pictogram on the game board.

Source.Name: granatier
Source.Description: Granatier is a clone of the classic Bomberman game, inspired by the work of the Clanbomber clone.
granatier, oyuncunun yüksekliği her turda azalan bir uçak içinde şehirlere hücum ettiği tek kişilik bir macera oyunudur.

Source.Name: print-manager
Source.Description: KDE print tool.

Source.Name: kruler
Source.Summary: A screen ruler and color measurement tool
Ekran cetveli ve renk ölçüm aracı
Source.Description: KRuler is a screen ruler and color measurement tool.
KRuler, bir ekran cetveli ve renk ölçüm aracıdır.

Source.Name: blinken
Source.Description: Memory Enhancement Game
Hafıza geliştirme oyunu.

Source.Name: kbruch
Source.Summary: Practice calculating with fractions and percentages
Ondalık ve kesirli sayılarla pratik yapın
Source.Description: KBruch is a small program to practice calculating with fractions and percentages. Different exercises are provided for this purpose and you can use the learning mode to practice with fractions. The program checks the user's input and gives feedback.
KBruch, ondalık ve kesirli sayılar üzerine işlemleri öğrenmeye ve egzersiz yapmaya yarayan bir uygulamadır.

Source.Name: kcalcore
Source.Description: A calendar contains information like incidences (events, to-dos, journals), alarms, time zones, and other useful information.

Source.Name: kmailtransport
Source.Description: Mail Transport Service

Source.Name: dolphin
Source.Description: Dolphin is the File Manager for KDE.

Source.Name: kdepimlibs
Source.Description: Contains KDE5 PIM (Personal Information Management) base libraries.
KDE5 PIM (Personal Information Management - Kişisel Bilgi Yönetimi) uygulamaları için gerekli kitaplıkları içerir.

Package.Name: kdepimlibs-devel
Package.Summary: Development package for KDE5 PIM libraries
KDE5 PIM kitaplıkları için geliştirme paketi
Package.Description: Contains development tools and header files for KDE5 PIM (Personal Information Management) base libraries.
KDE5 PIM (Personal Information Management - Kişisel Bilgi Yönetimi) uygulamaları için gerekli kitaplıklarla ilgili geliştirme araçları ve başlık dosyalarını içerir.

Source.Name: kalgebra
Source.Description: KAlgebra is a fully featured calculator that lets you plot different types of 2D and 3D functions and to calculate easy and not so easy calculations, such as addition, trigonometric functions or derivatives.
KAlgebra, farklı farklı 2B ve 3B fonksiyonları çizmek, kolay ve o kadar da kolay olmayan trigonometrik veya türev gibi hesaplamaları yapmak için bir uygulamadır.

Source.Name: kalarmcal
Source.Summary: Library to provides access and handling of KAlarm calendar data
Source.Description: Library to provides access and handling of KAlarm calendar data

Source.Name: bomber
Source.Description: Bomber is a single player arcade game. The player is invading various cities in a plane that is decreasing in height.

Source.Name: akonadi-calendar
Source.Description: Calendar integration for Akonadi.
